topic.title: RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY CLOCK HOURS MAXIMUM STAGE
topic.shortdesc: The number of clock hours (where the circumferential extent of the disease is described in segments as if the top of the eye were 12 on the face of a clock)Â affected by Retinopathy of Prematurity as determined during Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening.
